purpose: The email announces a Call for Papers (CfP) for a special issue of the Information and Software Technology journal focused on 'Next-Generation Model-Based Software Engineering with Foundation Models.' It invites researchers to submit original, unpublished work that explores the intersection of model-based software engineering and foundation models. The special issue aims to highlight innovations and applications of foundation models in various software engineering tasks, such as model completion and development of domain-specific languages. Submissions will undergo a rigorous review process, and the email provides details on submission topics, instructions, and deadlines.
